author: jleroux
msg: Adds deployed-date-time and clean-deployed-date-time targets. To set the date and time of last deployment info in the footer
Puts a check on svinfo and gitinfo (only used if it's a local copy)
Adds and uses CommonDeployedThe label in footer.ftl with the new deployed-date-time  target
Minor changes and formatting in the footer.ftl files

author: desruisseaux
msg: More robust check about whether it is safe to associate a value class to a TypeName.
